titles.title: United States Center for Safe Sport Authorization Act of 2017
United States Center for Safe Sport Authorization Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Ted Stevens Olympic and Amateur Sports Act to expand the purposes of the corporation, to designate the United States Center for Safe Sport, and for other purposes.
United States Center for Safe Sport Authorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
